question:
Consider the following statements about the ARYA project:
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
  2. It aims to provide apprenticeship training to engineering graduates and diploma holders
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect. ARYA stands for “Attracting and retaining youth in Agriculture (ARYA)”. It is an initiative by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research. Second statement is incorrect. This project aims to attract and empower the Youth in Rural Areas to take up various Agri-enterprises in Agriculture, allied and service sector for sustainable income and gainful employment.
